cast.original_title: Batman vs Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
cast.overview: Batman, Batgirl, and Robin forge an alliance with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles to fight against the Turtles' sworn enemy, The Shredder, who has apparently teamed up with Ra's Al Ghul and The League of Assassins.
cast.title: Batman vs Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

details.biography:
Kyle James Kozub Mooney (born September 4, 1984) is an American comedian, actor, screenwriter, and film director.

He was a cast member on the NBC sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live from 2013 to 2022. Mooney co-wrote and starred in the 2017 film Brigsby Bear and co-created, co-wrote, produced, and starred in the adult animated television series Saturday Morning Star Hits!

Mooney has appeared on several shows, including Jimmy Kimmel Live! and Sports Show with Norm Macdonald. He has also served as a writer and performer with the Upright Citizens Brigade.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Kyle Mooney, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Kyle Mooney
